long_description: With no constraints on your midsection, the men's Giro Bib Bike Undershorts will let you breathe easier and ride more comfortably. Premium Italian Lycra(R) spandex.fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Performance chamois pad delivers maximum comfort in the saddle. Quick-access fly makes for smoother restroom breaks. Low-profile leg bands with silicone grippers keep undershorts in place without showing a ridge. Rear pockets secure your cargo close to the body. Wear the men's Giro Bib Bike Undershorts under any jersey or shirt without pockets. Made in California.
short_description: With no constraints on your midsection, the men's Giro Bib Bike Undershorts will let you breathe easier and ride more comfortably.
